title: Decision Tree Algorithm Application for Parametric Design Learning Strategies

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Programming Skills and Understanding of Design Principles
context.additional_context: Students engage in hands-on practice using personal devices and receive continuous feedback through formative assessments.

learning_goals: Participants can explain the fundamental principles of the Decision Tree algorithm (ID3) and its application in parametric design.
Based on design attributes and test criteria, participants can construct a decision tree to derive optimal design strategies.
Participants can apply automated procedures to solve new parametric design problems using learned rules.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
